FuncDef: This command configures the local values for the max-recovery and the max-restart intervals used in the RSVP Graceful Restart Helper feature when applied to a GMPLS UNI.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum recovery interval value, in s. Values-1 to 1800.
Specifies the maximum restart interval value, in s. Values-1 to 300.
